metadata.description:
Following the adventures of teenage witch, Sabrina, and her wacky aunts and talking cat! Using the "shojo" style of "manga" (Japanese romance comics) to tell her tale, Tania introduces a thrilling new world of romance and relationships to Sabrina's life!

NOTE: There is a small black bar at the top of each page due to how Sabrina the Teenage Witch was originally printed. It is not visible in guided view mode.
metadata.name: Sabrina Manga
